nodes.text: The Allyuen spaceport was a spaceport on Allyuen, a world located in the Anoat sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories, that was garrisoned by the Galactic Empire.

During the Iron Blockade, which was established by the Empire in an attempt to prevent news of their crushing defeat by the Alliance to Restore the Republic at the Battle of Endor from reaching the Anoat sector's populace, an individual contacted the Smuggler and asked to meet in the Allyuen spaceport. The contact was interested in making a more formal alliance with them, but first needed aid in removing a tracking device from their person. The Smuggler sent a crew member to assist the individual, also deploying an additional five to directly assault the Allyuen Garrison, which, having seen little action, had grown complacent.
The Allyuen spaceport was first mentioned in the canon mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, which was developed by Kabam for iOS and Android platforms and released in 2015.
